name: Securing Emotional and Psychological Independence
description: Rebuilding a strong sense of self, identity, and autonomy after escaping a PSN relationship.

cards.title: Rewiring Your Emotional Responses
cards.description: Deprogramming conditioned emotional reactions that were implanted by the PSN.
bulletpoints: Using cognitive reframing to break trauma bonds.
Practicing emotional neutrality when reflecting on past experiences.
Engaging in mental rewiring exercises to reclaim autonomy over your emotions.

cards.title: Rebuilding Self-Worth and Social Confidence
cards.description: Restoring a strong sense of self and developing healthy interpersonal trust.
bulletpoints: Using progressive exposure to safe and supportive relationships.
Setting firm boundaries to reinforce emotional independence.
Practicing self-affirmation techniques to reestablish self-esteem.

cards.title: Developing Long-Term Narcissist Resistance
cards.description: Ensuring lifelong immunity against future PSN manipulation.
bulletpoints: Recognizing early warning signs before emotional attachment forms.
Building an internal ‘lie detector’ for manipulative tactics.
Cultivating relationships based on mutual respect and emotional security.
